Module ex6
Package ex6

Class TopicManagerSingleton.TopicManager

java.lang.Object
ex6.TopicManagerSingleton.TopicManager
Enclosing class:
TopicManagerSingleton
public static class TopicManagerSingleton.TopicManager extends Object
Inner static class that holds the singleton instance of TopicManager. This class manages a collection of topics, ensuring thread safety and singleton behavior.

  • Field Details

    • instance

      public static final TopicManagerSingleton.TopicManager instance
      The singleton instance of TopicManager. This instance is created lazily and is thread-safe.

  • Method Details

    • get

      public static TopicManagerSingleton.TopicManager get()
      Returns the singleton instance of TopicManager.
      Returns:
      the singleton instance of TopicManager

    • getTopic

      public Topic getTopic(String name)
      Retrieves a topic by its name. If the topic does not exist, it creates a new one. This method is thread-safe.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the topic
      Returns:
      the Topic object associated with the specified name

    • getTopics

      public ConcurrentHashMap<String,Topic> getTopics()
      Returns all topics managed by this TopicManager.
      Returns:
      a ConcurrentHashMap containing all topics

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Clears all topics managed by this TopicManager. This method removes all entries from the topics map.

    • printTopics

      public void printTopics()
      Prints the names of all topics to the console. If no topics are available, it prints a message indicating this.

    • getTopicsNames

      public String[] getTopicsNames()
      Retrieves the names of all topics managed by this TopicManager.
      Returns:
      an array of topic names
